description: Reversion of o.g.f. for Bell numbers (A000110) omitting a(0)=1.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for reversions of series
maple: read transforms; A := series(exp(exp(x)-1),x,60); SERIESTOLISTMULT(%); subsop(1=NULL,%); REVERT(%);
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
